tutorials/python-tutorials.description: In the days of ChatGPT, automating your daily tasks has never been so easy. You can supercharge your automation workflows if you gain some basic understanding of programming. Python is a beginner-friendly programming language and can be used in multiple scenarios.

tutorials/readability.title: Readability
tutorials/readability.description: Legibility and readability can be easily confused. Let’s start with ‘legibility’, as the more important of the two. Legibility simply means that the text can be read. The contrast between the background and the font color is sufficient, the size is suitable, the letterforms can be easily distinguished.
